verses.t: Follow after{G1377} charity{G3588}, and{G1161} desire{G2206} spiritual{G4152} gifts, but{G1161} rather{G3123} that{G2443} ye may prophesy{G4395}.

For{G1063} he that{G3588} speaketh{G2980} in an{G1100} unknown tongue{G1100} speaketh{G2980} not{G3756} unto men{G444}, but{G235} unto God{G3588}: for{G1063} no{G3762} man understandeth{G191} him; howbeit{G1161} in the spirit{G4151} he speaketh{G2980} mysteries{G3466}.
But{G1161} he that{G3588} prophesieth{G4395} speaketh{G2980} unto men{G444} to edification{G3619}, and{G2532} exhortation{G3874}, and{G2532} comfort{G3889}.
He that{G3588} speaketh{G2980} in an{G1100} unknown tongue{G1100} edifieth{G3618}himself{G1438}; but{G1161} he that{G3588} prophesieth{G4395} edifieth{G3618} the church{G1577}.

I would{G2309} that ye{G5209} all{G3956} spake{G2980} with tongues{G1100}, but{G1161} rather{G3123} that{G2443} ye prophesied{G4395}: for{G1063} greater{G3187} is he that{G3588} prophesieth{G4395} than{G2228} he that{G3588} speaketh{G2980} with tongues{G1100}, except{G1622} he interpret{G1329}, that{G2443} the church{G3588} may receive{G2983} edifying{G3619}.

Now{G3570}, brethren{G80}, if{G1437} I come{G2064} unto{G4314} you{G5209} speaking{G2980} with tongues{G1100}, what{G5101} shall I profit{G5623} you{G5209}, except{G1437} I shall speak{G2980} to you{G5213} either{G2228} by{G1722} revelation{G602}, or{G2228} by{G1722} knowledge{G1108}, or{G2228} by{G1722} prophesying{G4394}, or{G2228} by{G1722} doctrine{G1322}?

And even{G3676} things{G3588} without life{G895} giving{G1325} sound{G5456}, whether{G1535} pipe{G836} or{G1535} harp{G2788}, except{G1437} they give{G1325} a distinction{G1293} in the sounds{G3588}, how{G4459} shall it be known{G1097} what{G3588} is piped{G832} or{G2228} harped{G2789}?
For{G1063} if{G1437} the trumpet{G4536} give{G1325} an uncertain{G82} sound{G5456}, who{G5101} shall prepare himself{G3903} to{G1519} the battle{G4171}?

So{G3779} likewise{G2532} ye{G5210}, except{G1437} ye utter{G1325} by{G1223} the tongue{G3588} words{G3056} easy{G2154} to be{G2071} understood{G2154}, how{G4459} shall it be known{G1097} what{G3588} is spoken{G2980}? for{G1063} ye shall speak{G2980} into{G1519} the air{G109}.
There are{G2076}, it may{G1487} be{G5177}, so many{G5118} kinds{G1085} of voices{G5456} in{G1722} the world{G2889}, and{G2532} none{G3762} of them{G846} is without signification{G880}.

Therefore{G3767} if{G1437} I know{G1492} not{G3361} the meaning{G3588} of the voice{G3588}, I shall be{G2071} unto him{G3588} that speaketh{G2980} a barbarian{G915}, and{G2532} he{G3588} that speaketh{G2980} shall be a barbarian{G915} unto{G1722} me{G1698}.

Even{G2532} so{G3779} ye{G5210}, forasmuch as{G1893} ye are{G2075} zealous{G2207} of spiritual{G4151} gifts, seek{G2212} that{G2443} ye may excel{G4052} to{G4314} the edifying{G3588} of the church{G3588}.
Wherefore{G1355} let him{G3588} that speaketh{G2980} in an{G1100} unknown tongue{G1100} pray{G4336} that{G2443} he may interpret{G1329}.
For{G1063} if{G1437} I pray{G4336} in an{G1100} unknown tongue{G1100}, my{G3450} spirit{G3588} prayeth{G4336}, but{G1161} my{G3450} understanding{G3563} is{G2076} unfruitful{G175}.

What{G5101} is it{G2076} then{G3767}? I will pray{G4336} with the spirit{G3588}, and{G1161} I will pray{G4336} with the understanding{G3588} also{G2532}: I will sing{G5567} with the spirit{G3588}, and{G1161} I will sing{G5567} with the understanding{G3588} also{G2532}.

Else{G1893} when{G1437} thou shalt bless{G2127} with the spirit{G3588}, how{G4459} shall{G378} he that{G3588} occupieth{G378} the room{G3588} of the unlearned{G3588} say{G2046} Amen{G281} at{G1909} thy{G4674} giving of thanks{G2169}, seeing{G1894} he understandeth{G1492} not{G3756} what{G5101} thou sayest{G3004}?
For{G1063} thou{G4771} verily{G3303} givest thanks{G2168} well{G2573}, but{G235} the other{G2087} is{G3618} not{G3756} edified{G3618}.
I thank{G2168} my{G3450} God{G3588}, I speak{G2980} with tongues{G1100} more than{G3123} ye{G5216} all{G3956}:

Yet{G235} in{G1722} the church{G1577} I had rather{G2309} speak{G2980} five{G4002} words{G3056} with{G1223} my{G3450} understanding{G3588}, that{G2443} by my voice I might teach{G2727} others{G243} also{G2532}, than{G2228} ten thousand{G3463} words{G3056} in{G1722} an{G1100} unknown tongue{G1100}.
Brethren{G80}, be{G1096} not{G3361} children{G3813} in understanding{G3588}: howbeit{G235} in malice{G3588} be ye children{G3515}, but{G1161} in understanding{G5424} be{G1096} men{G5046}.

In{G1722} the law{G3588} it is written{G1125}, With{G1722} men of other tongues{G2084} and{G2532} other{G2087} lips{G5491} will I speak{G2980} unto this{G5129} people{G3588}; and{G2532} yet for all that{G3779} will they{G1522} not{G3761} hear{G1522} me{G3450}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}.

Wherefore{G5620} tongues{G3588} are{G1526} for{G1519} a sign{G4592}, not{G3756} to them{G3588} that believe{G4100}, but{G235} to them{G3588} that believe not{G571}: but{G1161} prophesying{G4394} serveth not{G3756} for them{G3588} that believe not{G571}, but{G235} for them{G3588} which believe{G4100}.

If{G1437} therefore{G3767} the whole{G3650} church{G3588} be come together{G4905} into{G1909} one place{G846}, and{G2532} all{G3956} speak{G2980} with tongues{G1100}, and{G1161} there come in{G1525} those that are unlearned{G2399}, or{G2228} unbelievers{G571}, will they{G2046} not{G3756} say{G2046} that{G3754} ye are mad{G3105}?

But{G1161} if{G1437} all{G3956} prophesy{G4395}, and{G1161} there come in{G1525} one{G5100} that believeth not{G571}, or{G2228} one unlearned{G2399}, he is convinced{G1651} of{G5259} all{G3956}, he is judged{G350} of{G5259} all{G3956}:

And{G2532} thus{G3779} are{G1096} the secrets{G2927} of his{G846} heart{G3588} made{G1096} manifest{G5318}; and{G2532} so{G3779} falling down{G4098} on{G1909} his face{G4383} he will worship{G4352} God{G3588}, and report{G518} that{G3754} God{G3588} is{G2076} in{G1722} you{G5213} of a truth{G3689}.

How{G5101} is it{G2076} then{G3767}, brethren{G80}? when{G3752} ye come together{G4905}, every one{G1538} of you{G5216} hath{G2192} a psalm{G5568}, hath{G2192} a doctrine{G1322}, hath{G2192} a tongue{G1100}, hath{G2192} a revelation{G602}, hath{G2192} an interpretation{G2058}. Let{G1096} all things{G3956} be done{G1096} unto{G4314} edifying{G3619}.

If{G1535} any man{G5100} speak{G2980} in{G2596} an{G1100} unknown tongue{G1100}, let it be by{G303} two{G1417}, or{G2228} at the most{G4118} by three{G5140}, and{G2532} that by course{G3313}; and{G2532} let{G1329} one{G1520} interpret{G1329}.
But{G1161} if{G1437} there be{G5600} no{G3361}interpreter{G1328}, let him keep silence{G4601} in{G1722} the church{G1577}; and{G1161} let him speak{G2980} to himself{G1438}, and{G2532} to God{G3588}.
Let{G1161} the prophets{G4396} speak{G2980} two{G1417} or{G2228} three{G5140}, and{G2532} let{G1252} the other{G243} judge{G1252}.
If{G1437} any thing be revealed{G601} to another{G243} that sitteth by{G2521}, let{G4601} the first{G4413} hold his peace{G4601}.
For{G1063} ye may{G1410} all{G3956} prophesy{G4395} one{G1520} by{G2596} one{G1520}, that{G2443} all{G3956} may learn{G3129}, and{G2532} all{G3956} may be comforted{G3870}.
And{G2532} the spirits{G4151} of the prophets{G4396} are subject{G5293} to the prophets{G4396}.
For{G1063} God{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} the author of confusion{G181}, but{G235} of peace{G1515}, as{G5613} in{G1722} all{G3956} churches{G3588} of the saints{G40}.

Let your{G5216} women{G3588} keep silence{G4601} in{G1722} the churches{G3588}: for{G1063} it is{G2010} not{G3756} permitted{G2010} unto them{G846} to speak{G2980}; but{G235} they are commanded to be under obedience{G5293}, as{G2531} also{G2532} saith{G3004} the law{G3588}.

And{G1161} if{G1487} they will{G2309} learn{G3129} any thing{G5100}, let them ask{G1905} their{G2398} husbands{G435} at{G1722} home{G3624}: for{G1063} it is{G2076} a shame{G150} for women{G1135} to speak{G2980} in{G1722} the church{G1577}.
What{G2228}? came{G1831} the word{G3588} of God{G3588} out{G1831} from{G575} you{G5216}? or{G2228} came it{G2658} unto{G1519} you{G5209} only{G3441}?

If{G1487} any man{G5100} think himself{G1380} to be{G1511} a prophet{G4396}, or{G2228} spiritual{G4152}, let him acknowledge{G1921} that the things{G3739} that{G3754} I write{G1125} unto you{G5213} are{G1526} the commandments{G1785} of the Lord{G3588}.
But{G1161} if{G1487} any man{G5100} be ignorant{G50}, let him be ignorant{G50}.
Wherefore{G5620}, brethren{G80}, covet{G2206} to prophesy{G4395}, and{G2532} forbid{G2967} not{G3361} to speak{G2980} with tongues{G1100}.
Let all things{G3956} be done{G1096} decently{G2156} and{G2532} in{G2596} order{G5010}.
